00025 #ifndef _ROBOT_ROBOTCONTROLLER_
00026 #define _ROBOT_ROBOTCONTROLLER_
00027 
00028 #include <robot/robot>
00029 
00030 #include <robot/Controller>
00031 #include <robot/Robot>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace robot {
00035 
00036 /**
00037  * Base class of Controllers that are complete top-level 
00038  *  robot controllers (as opposed to the subcontrollers from which
00039  *   they may be composed).
00040  */
00041 class RobotController : public Controller
00042 {
00043 public:
00044   RobotController(ref<Robot> robot)
00045     : robot(robot)
00046   { this->setControlInterface(robot->getControlInterface()); } 
00047   ///!!! perhaps calling virtual from construtror is bad - object not completely constructed yet? will get parent method instead? (it's not defined, so why does it compile?)
00048   
00049 protected:
00050   ref<Robot> robot; ///< controlled robot
00051 
00052 private:
00053   RobotController() {}
00054 };
00055 
00056 
00057 } // robot
00058 
00059 #endif
